cab.content: Printed for the Cabinet. July 1945.SECRET. Copy No.CP. (45) 83.lbth July, 1945.CABINET.THE VIGILANTES.Note by the Prime Minister.I deeply regret to see the continued prominence of the Vigilantes, as reportedin the newspapers. This is a matter of considerable importance, and lawlessnessshould not be allowed. The law officers and the police should consider all meansof putting an end to these pranks; and the newspapers should be induced as faras possible by the Minister of Information to curtail their publicity.I thought we decided at the last Cabinet at which I was present that allpossible steps were to be taken.Pray let me have a report.w. s. c.10 Downing Street, S. W. 1,loth July, 1945.[30238]
